PARAMETERS.name: wages
PARAMETERS.LaTeX: \begin{aligned} &\text{wages} = \begin{cases} 10.0 & \text{if student is 1} \\ 10.0 & \text{if student is 2} \\ 9.9 & \text{if student is 3} \\ 9.8 & \text{if student is 4} \\ 10.8 & \text{if student is 5} \\ 11.3 & \text{if student is 6} \end{cases} \end{aligned}

PARAMETERS.name: hours
PARAMETERS.LaTeX: \begin{aligned} &\text{hours} = \begin{cases} 6 & \text{if student is 1} \\ 0 & \text{if student is 2} \\ 6 & \text{if student is 3} \\ 4 & \text{if student is 4} \\ 3 & \text{if student is 5} \\ 0 & \text{if student is 6} \end{cases} \end{aligned}

VARIABLES.name: hours_1
VARIABLES.LaTeX: \begin{aligned} &\text{hours}_1 = \begin{cases} h_{1,\text{Monday}} & \text{if student is 1} \\ h_{2,\text{Monday}} & \text{if student is 2} \\ h_{3,\text{Monday}} & \text{if student is 3} \\ h_{4,\text{Monday}} & \text{if student is 4} \\ h_{5,\text{Monday}} & \text{if student is 5} \\ h_{6,\text{Monday}} & \text{if student is 6} \end{cases} \end{aligned}

VARIABLES.name: hours_2
VARIABLES.LaTeX: \begin{aligned} &\text{hours}_2 = \begin{cases} h_{1,\text{Tuesday}} & \text{if student is 1} \\ h_{2,\text{Tuesday}} & \text{if student is 2} \\ h_{3,\text{Tuesday}} & \text{if student is 3} \\ h_{4,\text{Tuesday}} & \text{if student is 4} \\ h_{5,\text{Tuesday}} & \text{if student is 5} \\ h_{6,\text{Tuesday}} & \text{if student is 6} \end{cases} \end{aligned}

VARIABLES.name: hours_3
VARIABLES.LaTeX: \begin{aligned} &\text{hours}_3 = \begin{cases} h_{1,\text{Wednesday}} & \text{if student is 1} \\ h_{2,\text{Wednesday}} & \text{if student is 2} \\ h_{3,\text{Wednesday}} & \text{if student is 3} \\ h_{4,\text{Wednesday}} & \text{if student is 4} \\ h_{5,\text{Wednesday}} & \text{if student is 5} \\ h_{6,\text{Wednesday}} & \text{if student is 6} \end{cases} \end{aligned}

VARIABLES.name: hours_4
VARIABLES.LaTeX: \begin{aligned} &\text{hours}_4 = \begin{cases} h_{1,\text{Thursday}} & \text{if student is 1} \\ h_{2,\text{Thursday}} & \text{if student is 2} \\ h_{3,\text{Thursday}} & \text{if student is 3} \\ h_{4,\text{Thursday}} & \text{if student is 4}
